Title: The Portable John Adams.

Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=BWdGUN6KPCcC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A collection of writings by America's second president features selections from his correspondence with his wife, Abigail, along with diary excerpts, parts of his memoirs, and such political writings as "A Dissertation on Canon and Feudal Law," "Thoughts on Government," "A Defense of Constitutions," "Novanglus," and ""Discourse on Davila."
